attributes.review: I did not have a good experience. Quiero mucho a trompas, but it was incredibly glitchy and not very well formatted. Also the app would take forever to load and the visuals were not pleasing at all. I hope they take this app back where it came from and fix it.
attributes.title: Not a well functioning app

attributes.review: I don’t want to be a Karen but when I opened the app my phone started glitching and naked photos of Trump popped up on my phone. Me and my child need therapy now and we don’t have the money for it. His little app hacked my phone and started sending out my passwords and important information to my contact list and strangers. YOURE LUCKY I WONT SUE😡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app glitched my phone then trump showed up at my door and my neighbors Pitbull. Was playing with him and a pig decided to shoot the dog in the head 3 times. Also they arrested my black neighbor for being outside on the porch because they thought it was someone else. This app will forever give me nightmares!
attributes.title: All these reviews are hella funny

attributes.review: Immediately after download, a small version of Donny jumped onto my desk and started shouting build the wall at me and my 2 year old. The mini Donny then started to kick and scream like baby because asked him why Mexico wasnt paying for it like he promised. This little monster is driving me wild. Donny is a little brat.
attributes.title: Highly Offensive

attributes.review:
okay this app is disgusting🤮 like I GENUINELY feel bad for the people that download this app like- this app is just plain out u s e l e s s. And I heard this app steals the user’s data. Do NOT download THIS APP😾 you will get hacked😢

Also I went to my lock screen and it started glitching!!!🐆 it basically ruins ur phone and it crashes every minute!🦀

🐣🐼🐨🐧🐱🦗🐶🦇🐨🙊🐰🦟🐱
attributes.title: HORRIBLE app👺

attributes.review: I can’t believe how disappointed I was with this app. I went on the app expecting to experience the world of elephants and their trumps but I was sadly disappointed with an orange one with distasteful opinions. I hope we can improve this app by adding quality pictures of elephants so we can be educated properly😌.
attributes.title: Elephants

attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. I opened the app and it completely logged me out. This app when it keeps logging me out is getting redundant and I refuse to give this app which has been poorly executed anything higher than a 1 Star if I could there would be no stars but sadly I cannot do that.
attributes.title: OUTRAGEOUS

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I didn’t expect anything out of the ordinary but as soon as I opened it a very inappropriate 18+ video started playing and now was sitting next to my 3 kids white getting my blonde bob retouched at the salon. This was a horrifying experience. I’m going to need to talk to the manager.
attributes.title: terrible terrible app

attributes.review: let me start off with this I first went onto the app and I saw the most disturbing pictures i have ever seen before. This app actually glitches into your account and hacks you. I would never use this app ever again the worst thing i have ever seen. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP!! can’t spell america without erica!
attributes.title: trump is an idiot

attributes.review: This app was so glitchy. I opened the app and right away it was already broken. I could only see a Cheeto. It was terrifying. Then when I got off the app my entire phone started glitching and next thing I know Cheetos are everywhere. Cheeto dust is even coming out of my phone 😤
attributes.title: Broken app and phone 😤
